parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch pedal attachment can cause the clutch pedal to detach from the linkage, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch hydraulic system can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The "check engine soon" or "service engine soon" light comes on
the vehicle hesitates or stalls
the transmission slips or hesitates when shifting gears
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driveshaft can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The driveshaft comes loose or detaches from the motor mount
the vehicle lifts off the ground
the vehicle loses power or hesitates.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the 4-wheel drive unit can cause the vehicle to lose traction, hesitate, or stall, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The 4-wheel drive unit does not engage or work properly
the vehicle loses traction or hesitates.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front struts can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries due to loose steering and uneven vehicle handling.
symptoms: Knocking noise underneath the vehicle
front of the car starts to shake
loose steering
vehicle pulls to one side
and loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate or incomplete recall repairs can lead to continued safety risks and further damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Recall repair did not resolve the issue
parts were not available
or the repair was not done correctly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Problems with steering and handling can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Front end wobbles
steering wheel gets hard
and loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Problems with the airbag and transmission can cause safety risks and affect vehicle performance.
symptoms: Engine check light comes on
driver's side airbag needs to be replaced
transmission pulls to one side
and noise coming from the heater.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Problems with motorcycle handling can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Front end wobbles
loss of control
and accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling can cause loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Engine stalling
shaking
and difficulty starting
often when reducing speed or turning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling fan bracket can cause the fan to damage the radiator, leading to overheating and engine damage.
symptoms: Sudden radiator failure
overheating
and damage to the air conditioning compressor.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the oxygen sensor can cause poor engine performance, decreased fuel efficiency, and increased emissions.
symptoms: Engine check light comes on
poor engine performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine cylinder/piston can cause engine damage, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Engine noise
cylinder/piston failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the windshield can obstruct the driver's view, leading to accidents.
symptoms: Windshield cracking due to road debris.
